channel.title: maven on ybakiame' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in maven on ybakiame' Blog

item.title: Maven项目xml过滤
item.description: 在 pom.xml 中添加 <build> <!--在进行模块化开发打jar包时，maven会将非java文件过滤掉，例如xml,properties等配置文件。--> <resources> <resource> <directory>src/main/java</directory> <includes> <include>**/*.properties</include> <include>**/*.xml</include> </includes> <filtering>false</filtering> </resource> <resource> <directory>src/main/resources</directory> <includes> <include>**/*.properties</include> <include>**/*.xml</include> </includes> <filtering>false</filtering> </resource> </resources> </build>
